bibl.title: Antiphon the Athenian. Oratory, Law, and Justice in the Age of the Sophists.
bibl.note: Introduction. - 1. The Sophistic Period. - 2. Antiphon: Life and Works. - 3. Truth [see in part. pp. 63-65: The Papyrus Fragments]. - 4. Concord, Dream-Interpretation. - 5. The Tetralogies. - 6. The Court Speeches. - 7. From the Sophists to Forensic Oratory. - Pp. 183-187: Appendix A. Truth: The Papyrus Fragments; - 189-194: Appendix B. Concord: The Fragments. - Abbreviations and Works Cited. Indices.
